title: I live in NHC and build a 12x12 shed in my back yard without a permit. Can the county come in and make me take it down if they find out?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/12/what-happens-if-new-hanover-county-finds-out-about-the-shed-i-built-in-my-backyard-without-a-permit/
